name: Dr. Sarah Chen
title: Executive Director
bio: Leading expert in food systems research with 15+ years of experience in sustainable agriculture and nutrition policy. Published over 50 peer-reviewed articles.

name: Dr. Michael Rodriguez
title: Senior Research Fellow
bio: Specializes in food security and climate adaptation strategies. Former advisor to UN Food and Agriculture Organization.

name: Dr. Priya Sharma
title: Data Science Lead
bio: Develops machine learning models for predicting food system vulnerabilities. PhD in Computational Biology from Harvard.

name: Dr. James Thompson
title: Policy Advisor
bio: Expert in international food policy and trade. Former consultant to World Bank and European Commission.

name: Dr. Maria Santos
title: Field Research Coordinator
bio: Coordinates field studies across Latin America. Focuses on smallholder farmer resilience and local food systems.

name: Dr. David Kim
title: Technology Innovation Lead
bio: Develops digital tools for food system monitoring and early warning systems. Background in remote sensing and IoT.
